page.title: 05THE GREAT EGG RACE
page.content: Class 4B made some model cars for an egg race.Some people made their models out of Lego while some used pieces of guttering and wood.Someone even made one out of a pencil box.There were two egg races.One was a motorised race and the other a pushing race.Dean Moss and Clifford won the motorised race.Marc Jackson and Melvin won the pushing race. Our cars had to travel a certain distance and had to carry an egg.Some cars stopped in the middle of the race and another car's motor blew at the beginning of the race.My car came last in the race and I won a consolation prize of a creme-egg.some people made a vehicle but didn't enter the competition.
